svg.text: View Notifications Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
View Notifications
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Comprehensive notification panel displaying achievement alerts, match updates,
friend requests, and system messages with read status management and filtering.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active account
Main Flow:
1. User clicks notification bell icon in top navigation bar
2. System displays notification panel with recent notifications
3. System shows notification count badge for unread notifications
4. Notifications include: Achievement unlocks, XP gains, match updates
5. System displays friend requests, match invitations, system announcements
6. Each notification shows: icon, title, description, timestamp
7. Unread notifications are highlighted with different styling
8. User can click notifications to view related content or take actions
9. System marks notifications as read when clicked or viewed
10. System provides "Mark All as Read" functionality
11. System maintains notification history with pagination
Alternative Flows:
A1. No notifications: System displays "No new notifications" message
A2. Notification actions: User can accept/decline friend requests directly
A3. Filter notifications: User can filter by type (achievements, matches, social)
A4. Delete notifications: User can remove individual notifications
A5. Notification settings: User can access notification preferences
A6. Real-time updates: New notifications appear automatically without refresh
